1211.content:
Once we were through the doors I started to relax a bit. After all, it wasn't my first time at a nudist resort.

Puberty had been reasonably kind to me so far. I wasn't uncomfortable about my shape, and I didn't get covered in zits like some kids. It was just the whole sex thing. I was fourteen years old and couldn't help having a hormonal reaction to seeing people naked and being seen naked. In the normal, textile world, this was an adolescent boy's fantasy and I was either a dream or a nightmare. Either way, it felt weird.

Maybe here too. I could see that, despite being more comfortable with nudism than I was, Jeff wasn't having any more luck controlling the hormones. He was trying to hide an erection by staying close to the counter. Come to that, even Dad wasn't exactly limp. I shuddered involuntarily and looked away. It least for me it wasn't so obvious.

Mum and Dad checked us in and we went up to our suite. It consisted of three bedrooms, a big bathroom with a bath and a shower, and an open-plan lounge and kitchenette that opened out onto a semi-private balcony overlooking the pool. Beyond the pool were tennis courts, and beyond them the beach. Off to the left was a golf course and to the right a lush forest with trails for hiking, biking and even - it said in the brochure - horseback riding, every other day. That was the one thing I was most looking forward to, but I didn't see any horses today. Perhaps tomorrow, then.

By the time we were unpacked, I was feeling more normal. The initial burst of hormones and anxiety had worn off and I was ready to go and enjoy the sun and the breeze on my skin. Jeff came out of his room, his boner deflated. It looked like he had acclimatized too.

"What are you kids going to do first?" asked Mum.

"Swim," we both said together.

"Alright. Stick together, you two," she said. "At least until we all know our way around."

Jeff and I grabbed towels and ran downstairs. We stepped out onto the patio and considered our options.

The pool was right here, but there were already lots of people in and around it. Little kids splashing and making noise, adults lounging in and out of the water and old people doing slow laps. But it was right there.

The beach was a few hundred yards away beyond the tennis courts. Out there we could probably find some space to ourselves, and once in the water our nakedness wouldn't be so obvious, but it was much further to go... past the busy tennis courts... in the nude.

"Where do you want to go?" asked Jeff.

Stick together, Mum had said, so I splashed into the sea after my brother.

We spent half an hour swimming back and forth, diving through the breakers, splashing each other and body surfing, and then staggered back up onto the beach, exhausted.

The sun was starting to get low in the sky and the clusters of people on the beach were starting to thin out. We toweled off and sat bare-assed on the sand, the towels around our shoulders to fend off the stiffening breeze.

"Look," said Jeff, pointing out to sea. There was a big launch sitting off shore. We could just make out the white-clad crew and scantily-clad (but clad) passengers on board. Some sort of party boat, or executive play-thing.

"Do you suppose they've come to gawk at the nudists?" I said, all anxiety long-since washed away by the exercise and sea air.

"Yeah, probably," said Jeff. Wanna give 'em a show?

"Nah. No point making it easy for them, it'll just encourage them."

"So what now, then," he said, laying back on the sand.

"I don't -" I stopped. There had been big a splash behind the boat and then its engines suddenly roared into life.

"Jeff, look!"

He propped himself up on his elbows, "What?"

"Something went into the sea behind the launch - something big - and now it's taking off." The launch swung around in a wide semi-circle and roared away to our right. Soon it would disappear beyond the rocky headland.

"So?"

"So, I think the something was a person."

Jeff jumped to his feet, leaving his towel in a damp clump on the sand.

I stood up too, brushing the sand from my bottom, towel still around my shoulders. Sure enough, there was an arm waving from the wake of the launch. I couldn't make out anything about the person it was attached to.

"Shit!" Jeff took off down the beach toward the water.

"Jeff! What are you doing?"

"Someone's got to go in after them!"

"But...!" There was no point arguing. He was diving full-length into the first of the breakers. He was a strong swimmer - best in his class - but it was a long way out there. Not to mention that he was naked, and we had no idea who it was that had been shoved into the water.

I looked along the beach toward the resort. There was almost no one left on the beach, now. Just a few of the volleyball bunnies, packing up their stuff. The sunbathers and assorted others had all already gone in to get "dressed" for dinner. Some of them would be back after dark, no doubt, for now there was nobody around to help. The boat wasn’t strange, since the camp was located next to the ocean, but what was on board intrigued her. She saw several men, wearing military style clothes on board. Jeff was clapping for her as Danni approached their table, "Congrats!" Danni blushed as he continued, "Certainly don't think I could've ever done it."

Danni rubbed her still sore bottom, "I didn't think I could either."

As she gently sat down, Gasptrow came back, "Contragulations, and may I ask if you have any questions about our menu? Our special tonight is a Vbumii with a sprinkling of cyanide, very popular with the Tchtchk."

Danni and Jeff paled at the idea that alien food would have poisonous (to humans) ingredients in it, "Uh, no thanks, I there a way to see if anything here is safe for us to eat?" Jeff asked, and at Gasptrow's pause he added, "Cyanide is poisonous to humans."

"Ahah." Gaspreow flushed purple, "My deepest apologies, just activate your communicator and wave it over the menu, it'll tell you what is safe for ingestion."

Nodding, Danni and Jeff scanned the menu and placed their orders, sure they'd didn't understand most of the names and words, but if it wouldn't poison them, it had to be good .... right?
12312111112221222.title: She fails again.

choices: The next morning, they continue investigating.
The alien hotel.
123121111122212221.content:
"So far so good." Jeff said. "After we eat, I'll ask Gapstrow if there's a hotel around here."

"Good idea." Danni replies. "I'm tired and my butt demands a bed."

Gapstrow came back holding two plates. "Two orders of ta'wqers and two glasses of paxkin juice, please enjoy it."

The twins observe their drinks, which had 3 layers of colors, purple, blue and yellow.

Danni is the first one to try it. "Delicious." She said.

"Okay, I guess I'll try our food." However, he looks how their plates had small brown creatures with elongated bodies and one was leaving his sister's plate and moving its multiple legs towards her. Danni realized this and screamed.

"Is there a problem?" Gapstrow quickly returns.

"These things are still alive!" Danni sticks to her chair.

"Oh, I'm truly sorry." It picks the escaping creature. "These are ta'wqers, they are an exquisite snack, but there's a trick." Gapstrow bites its head off and eats it. "They need to be eaten alive or at least five seconds after you..." It makes a gesture of breaking it in half.

The twins were grossed out, but they had no choice. Each one takes a ta'wquer and break it.

"It's not bad." Jeff commented. "It tastes like chicken."

After dinner, the twins were full and sleepy, with Gapstrow's indications, they arrive to an alien hotel.
123121111122212221.title: Bizarre alien food (is one dish still ALIVE?!)

choices: The twins have to share a soft padded nest with each other in the communal area
They have to share a large bed with several various aliens
1231211111222122212.content:
Jeff and Danni stood outside the hotel, their ride told them it was a highly recommended hotel for first time visitors, and didn't discriminate just because you had less than five limbs. That got an eyebrow raise from both twins, who were informed by their driver that in most of the Galaxy, having less than five limbs counts as disabled.

After finally watching the driver take off into the distance, the two looked at apeach other and sighed.

"Well, lets just find some beds and get a good rest." Jeff yawned as he stretched.

Danni nodded, yawning herself, the adrenaline of their first contact scenario and the whole restaurant experience was wearing off.

Walking into the hotel, they saw a simple round desk with an alien that had seven legs and three arms typing away at several holographic screens. "Ah! Welcome! You must be those 'Humans' that showed up on the bureau information panel!" The alien waved them closer, "I've always wanted to meet a species who'd needed left their planet before!"

Danni giggled, "He's like an alien you."

Jeff blushed, and looked back at the alien, "We'd like a room, two beds please."

"Room?" The alien asked, confused, "We have communal lodgings here." It waved at the large doorway behind the desk, "All travelers share a singular open space. Community and not truly being alone and all that."

Danni was hoping that they didn't have a communal bathroom, otherwise tomorrow morning would be very uncomfortable.

Jeff sighed, he was too tired to care, and a nod from Danni confirmed that she was tired enough as well, "Alright, well take it."

After paying, the twins entered the communal area and found the sleeping arrangements to be....
1231211111222122212.title: The alien hotel.

choices: Breakfast at the hotel or Dexa's.
Looking for information about the small aliens.
12312111112221222121.content:
Jeff and Danni see different aliens and find their spot that turn out to be a nest, it had enough space for both of them.

"Why am I not even surprised?" Danni thought.

Jeff touches it. "At least it feels comfy, how are going to do this?"

"Back to back." Danni yawns. "I'm tired and I don't really care, plus, it's not like we haven't shared a bed before."

Jeff agreed, so the twins lay down and settle.

"Jeff? Do you think we really can save that woman?" Danni asked, she was doubting a little.

"Of course, sis." Her brother responds. "Today, we met a bunch of aliens and we got translator implants, if we able to do that, imagine what we could do tomorrow."

Danni smiled. "Thanks, Jeff, I needed to hear it. Good night."

"Good night, Danni." Jeff closes his eyes and both sleep in this mysterious planet, hoping to get back to Earth
12312111112221222121.title: The twins have to share a soft padded nest with...

The Teenee, species supremacists who use mind control to invade primitive worlds
123121111122212221211.content:
Danni woke up slowly, her be done was extremely comfy, 'The resort ha she really improved the bed she since last time!' She thought to herself, snuggling deeper into her brothers bsck. WAIT. WHAT? Dannis' eyes snapped open, and upon seeing the back of Jeffs head, she jumped back in shock and disgust.

"Eheh eeewww!" She moaned as she tried to remove the feeling of sleeping against her brother from her memory. Unfortunately Jeff just happened to be waking up right now a second well...

"Mornin' Danni." He said as he stood up and stretched, Danni looked at him and was about to say something when her face turned red and she looked away. "What?" Jeff asked, but a sense he moved he realized what was wrong, good old morning wood. "I'll uh ... take care of this." Jeff said awkwardly, and at Danni's disgusted face he blushed and added, "Not like that! Just give me a bit."

Danni nodded, getting her brother out of line of sight as she went to the bathroom, thankfully most of the other hotel guests were either still sleeping or long gone. Unfortunately, the hotel bathroom was co-ed, so she was not surprised when Jeff arrived a few minutes later, and started filling up a bathtub.

"Wanna join me?" He asked, knowing full well the last time they'd shared a bath was when they were five.

Danny sighed, but it might be their last creature comfort for a while depending on how today goes, "Move over."

After a quick bath, the twins were back at Dexa's for breakfast, they had a different server this time, so it was another uncomfortable questioning about what type of alien they were, where they were from, etc...

As the two munched on some Nnimij, which looked like anchovies with legs and kept trying to run off the table, they asked their server about the tiny aliens, learning that they were....
123121111122212221211.title: Breakfast at the hotel or Dexa's.

1231211111222122212111.content:
Describing the appearance of their accidental captors, the waiter was able to give them a name: The Kukoo.

The Kukoo an interstellar mafia. Primarily known to deal with specimens from unknown or exotic planets and sell them as slaves, their server said the authorities can't do anything about it since those planets aren't registered, one of the reasons why they were able to freely move around on this planet.

Danni was shocked by how those small aliens had this power and Jeff gulped. Leaving Dexa's, the twins talk.

"What's the plan?" asked Danni.

"I don't have one, this is a bigger problem than I thought." admitted Jeff.

"Why? We only have to deal with those two, it doesn't matter if they involved with traffickers, there's still a chance to save that woman." his sister responds.

"And what if they call for backup? Then it will be game over for us." Jeff said.

"Jeff, you are saying we should just leave her?."

"No." Jeff shakes his head. "But we can't make a move if there's too much at stake and I can't pretend that I'm not worried if something happens to you!"

Danni stayed silent. "Jeff." she tries to hug him, but for obvious reasons, she only pats his back. "I'm also worried if something happens to my loving brother, but you heard them, they are going to move her off the planet and then we won't be able to do anything."

Danni had a point, Jeff still unsure sighed and said.
1231211111222122212111.title: The Kukoo, an interstellar mafia dealing in exo...

choices: An interview in an alien bar
Meeting back at the hotel/Dexa's
12312111112221222121111.content:
Walking about as nervous as one could in a crowded trading city on an alien planet, the twins managed to work up the nerve to go back to the alleyway that they'd been accidentally teleported to. "Here we go." Jeff said with some finality, trying to hype himself up to fight the aliens and rescue the lady. They approached the corner that hid the spaceship they escaped and that started this whole misadventure.

Danni nodded and Jeff took the lead, ready to board that Kukoo ship and rescue their prisoner, soon to be slave, but the ship was gone. The twins looked around, feeling around for the ship just in case it had a cloaking device, but nothing. It wasn't there.

"I guess that's their engine scorch mark." Jeff pointed at the dark, ashy spot in the center of the alley.

Danni tried to hold it together, she really did, but the fact that the only aliens who took them, and could more than likely get them home, and had that lady they were going to sell, were gone was just too much. She dropped to her knees and started crying, she wanted to go home! She would never complain about going to the nudist resort again if she could just see their house, heck even their basement, again! She felt Jeff wrapping his arms around her in a somewhat awkward hug considering their state of undress. She just leaned into his shoulder and cried herself dry.

After she was done, she looked up at Jeff, "What're we gonna do?"

Jeff shrugged, looking just as sad, but holding back tears to stat brave for her, "I'm not sure, but we'll figure it out."

"Hey you two!" They heard someone call them. Looking behind themselves, they saw an alien that looked like an English bulldog centaur, "You two gotta problem with the Kukoo?" At their nod, he waved them over, "C'mere, I gotta job for ya."

(Just to set the tone for what follows: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=oM_WvP4bVK...)

123121111122212221211111.content:
Full of questions, the twins follow the centaur to a nearby bar.

"Aren't we still minors? We shouldn't be here." Danni said, but she was ignored by his brother.

The twins sit on a table while the centaur went for a drink.

"There ya go." He brings three jars with a blue liquid. "The best poison around here." However, the twins declined.

"Why you bring us here?" Jeff asks.

"Because anybody who has a problem with the kukoo, I consider them as potential allies." He chuckles. "Where are my manners? The name's is Pshyx."

"So.." Danni adds.

"Sorry, that takes me to this point, why are you against them?."

Jeff quickly summarizes their story.

"I see, if you are okay with it, I would like to make you some questions."

"Go ahead." Jeff replies, Danni rolled her eyes, she was starting to get tired of questions.

"Are you fast?".

Both nodded.

"Do you work together or one of you does the majority of the work?"

"We work together." Jeff says.

"Are you familiar with ships?"

Jeff makes a hand gesture of 50/50. "I haven't driven one yet, but some designs are similar to the ones I read on Earth." Danni facepalmed, knowing that her brother was bluffing with knowledge from comic books.

"I still need to see you in action." Pshyx said. "Well, you got lucky today fellas, I'm putting together a crew." Pshyx says.

"We are not interested." Danni refuses. "How are we sure you don't work for them?"

"I used to." Pshyx says. "Part of my job was the usual, beating guys who didn't pay their debt, fighting against other groups, that was until I saw the leader of the group dragging an alien who it was scared as hell and it had a leash on. That's when I realized I hit rock bottom. For me nothing is more sacred than freedom itself and looking back at how I helped them to bring innocent lives to a living nightmare, I swore that I would bring them down."

The twins didn't say anything and stared at Pshyx.

"That is the reason why I want a team, to finish the Kukoo once in for all. And also, if you accept to be part of it, I will pay you well and help you to rescue the female that they still have." Pshyx proposes

Jeff accepted and the three of them leave the bar, then...
123121111122212221211111.title: An interview in an alien bar

choices: Undergo training first, figuring out what they'd be doing on the ship
Undergo their physical first, much to Jeffs chagrin
1231211111222122212111111.content:
Pshyx's base was little more than a hangar where his ship was docked, and while it wasn't as streamlined as some of the ships coming to and leaving the starport, it certainly looked tough. "Here she is, the Sliver Slug."

Jeff could only groan, why did space have to be so different? He was expecting a sleek cruiser or a cool old ship like in Star Wars with a cool name, not this stuff!

Danni giggled at her brothers exasperation, but turned to Pshyx, "Didn't you say you had a crew?"

Pshyx nodded, "Here they come." He gestured to the door that had just opened, and four aliens came out, "The tall muddy brown (humanoid) one with the tentacles covering her mouth and three tits is Cthulhii, she's our medic," Jeff looked up at that, and immediately wished he hadn't although her body was almost humanlike (aside from being too tall and lanky), she was slimy, wrinkly, and not what he was expecting when seeing an alien babe. "The purple stocky three legged and three armed guy here with the pincers is Xendakk, our close combat specialist," Pshyx gestured to what looked like a tiny, neon green, glowing goldfish in a floating fishbowl, "This here is Zex, our pilot." And to the one that could be best described as a yellow bald eagle without wings, "And last but not least, this is Fredum, our hacker."

Danni and Jeff looked at the group of almost comically mismatched aliens, Danni was trying not to giggle at the near irony of Fredum's name, while Jeff was trying to figure out how the fish flew a spaceship.

"Crew," Pshyx addressed his motley team, "this is Danni and Jeff, they're in the same boat Zex was in five years ago." The crew made a few gestures and movements that the twins figured were each species signs of sympathy, "And we need to get them readied up and good to go by tonight."

Cthulhii raised a slimy arm, "I don't mean to boss you around boss," Jeff and danni were surprised at her voice, if they'd closed they eyes, she'd sound like some drop dead gorgeous model! "but as the ships medic, I think I should get them checked out first, make sure they've got all their immunizations, and no hidden injuries."

Jeff was immediately trying to figure out how to avoid THAT.

Pshyx shrugged, "I really don't care what you's guys do, I've gotta go get our docking fees paid and sorted so we can leave with the moon at our backs."

At that, he left, and the crew decided to have the twins....

"You heard the boss." Xendakk said. "I guess you two will follow me for your training."

"Not so fast." Cthulhii intervenes. "I need them for a physical test."

"No, that's okay." Jeff nervously refuses. "Pretty sure we are fine."

Danni noticed her brother's fear and smiled. "Come on, Jeff. We have to." She grabs his arm. "We can't put ourselves in danger with germs and virus."

"I don't want to be examined by her." Jeff whispers.

"This was your idea, Jeff Solo." She giggles. "Besides, you own me for the show me at Dexa's"

Cthulhii guides the twins to her office.

"Very well." She grabs a stethoscope. "Who goes first?"

Jeff kept his attitude, so his sister volunteers.

The humanoid medic takes her measurements and does the usual medical check. "So, you are also against the Kukoo?" she asks. Danni nods and they talk about their situation. "I see." Cthulhii comments. "I hope I can be useful for you during this trip." Finishing the check.

"See? It wasn't so bad." said Danni, covered in mud.

"I apologize for that. You can use the shower at the end of the hall."

Danni thanks her and leaves, while Jeff prepares for his "torment". A few minutes later, Jeff enters into the shower.

"How was it?" Danni says.

"Don't ask." Her brother responds.

After this, they..

choices: Danni and Xendakk's combat/infiltration training
Jeff and Zex' flight training
123121111122212221211111121.content:
Walking down the well worn, but still maintained hall of the Silver Slug, the twins came out to the common room, Xendakk and Fredum were playing some sort of guessing game, and Zex was looking at star charts on the wall. "They're good to go." Cthulhii said as she walked up behind them, startling the two of them.

Xendakk skittered over to them, "Alrighty then." He pointed at both of them with an arm and rubbed his chin with his third, "What're you two good at anyway? We gotta know so that we can get you prepped for this job."

Danni raised her hand, "I'm a gymnast back home, but I don't really have much in the means of fighting experience, or any other ... experience."

Jeff, trying not to look at Cthulhii's behind as she sat down on a box, causing a small puddle of slime to pool around her, thought of anything he knew that'd be applicable to their new situation. "I've played plenty of flight simulators back home, but I don't have any experience behind the real thing. Or anything that isn't from Earth." Danni facepalmed as he tried to maintain his cover story that's he told Pshyx, 'Those video games of yours better be good for something' she thought to herself.

Xendakk bobbed his head at Danni, "I'll have to figure out how to use your bendy-ness, but you'd be good as an infiltrator if you're flexible enough." He pointed at hers and Cthulhii's chests, "At least your chest lumpy-things ain't as big as hers."

Cthulhii growled at Xendakk, "They're called teats, Xendakk." She emphasized that with cupping the three of hers, a good two or three sizes larger than Danni's, "And most females don't like it when they're belittled."

Danni blushed and crossed her arms, partly out of embarrassment and partially out of frustration at Xendakk, who clearly didn't have tact, and was inadvertently insulting her body, at least she might have a friend in Cthulhii. Jeff just looked anywhere but his sister's and the crew mates chests, that's not a comparison he wants to make right now.

Xendakk threw his arm behind Jeff's shoulder, "Go with Zex, get acquainted with the ship, 'bout time we had a new copilot. Pshyx may own the thing, but he doesn't know his left from his right, good fist fighter though."
123121111122212221211111121.title: Have a talk with the rest of the crew.

"Let's see what could be your training." Xendakk said, he looks at Cthulhii. "Why are you still here?"

"Because I want to make sure that you don't act like a jerk again. Apparently, your species don't know how to treat females." She replies.

"Whatever. We don't have time for this." Xendakk moves towards a vent. "Okay, gymnast, let's do a simulation exercise." He breaks it. "Given that Pshyx didn't give you a tour around the Silver Slug, you'll have to check every vent in here and return in >>5 minutes<<."

Danni thought about it and without hesitating, she crawls inside the vent.

"Good luck." Cthulhii said.

The blonde girl looks for other possible exits. She was able to freely move inside the vents. The first she found was like a weight room, then, she saw her brother talking to Zex, she almost laughs at how weird the scene looked. Ending with each room of the crew, Danni crawls back to where Xendakk was.

"Done." She recovers her breath.

"Perfect, kid." Xendakk replies. "Now, we will do a quick combat training."

He closes one of his hands and directs it to her, but she was able to dodge it.

"At least you have good reflexes." However, an alarm starts to ring...

choices: Jeff and Danni chat with the crew
The twins are assigned their bunk and bunk mates
12312111112221222121111112112.content:
After a good few hours of training, an alarm sounded, but just when Danni tensed up and looked all panicked, Xendakk slapped her back, "Ah don't worry, it's just a call to the common room." Danni nodded and followed, tired from the physical training she'd been run through, she got a good layer of sweat on her. Of course, she had to explain to Cthulhii that no, humans did not excrete slime, sweat was just a way the human body cooled itself.

"Alright everyone," Pshyx said, clapping his paws together as his crew assembled in the common room, "the moon is high and my contact on Vygam let me know that the Kukoo have advertised a new slave breed." He nodded at the twins, "Might be the female you two are trying to rescue, so we're taking off now."

Zex bobbed in the water in his fishbowl and floated to the cockpit, "Instructive: follow me, student-copilot. Condescending: perhaps you will acknowledge my superiority."

Jeff sighed and followed Zex, as did Pshyx and Danni, to the cockpit. Danni was a bit surprised at how minimalist the control panels were, in the movies and tv shows, the cockpits are covered in switches and buttons. Here? Maybe a third of that, and a floating map of the galaxy in between the copilot and pilots seats.

A quick shake, and Danni felt as the ship lifted off, Jeff and Zex were checking gauges and Zex was setting the destination via long spiderlike arms that attached and detached from his fishbowl. "Statement: jumping to Vygam in three, two, one, mark!"

Jeff and Danni watched in awe as the stars streaked around them before a light white fog envelope did them, and the stars were still visible through it, looking like white lines passing through the fog.

Pshyx addressed the twins, "It'll be a few hours before we get there. Eat, sleep, clean up, relax, do whatever you have to do to get yourself in shap for this job. We'll find out if they're selling their slaves here, or just advertising them."
12312111112221222121111112112.title: Pshyx was calling for a meeting,

After eating some food that the crew had and taking a shower, the twins realized about something and look for Pshyx.

"Hey, Pshyx." Jeff said. "Where are we going to sleep?"

"Right." The centaur replies. "I didn't think of that."

"Maybe they can sleep with us in our rooms." Cthulhii proposes. "I want Danni, only if she wants to, of course."

"After their first day here, I think it's a good idea." Pshyx responds. "That way to can know each other better."

Pshyx directed the twins to a hall with 3 rooms.

"Zex and Fredum share a room, and Xendakk and Cthulhii aren't exactly friends, so each one of you will be sleeping with them." He yawns. "Anyway, you should get some sleep for tommorrow, I know I need it." He leaves.

Cthulhii opens the door's room to show Danni around. "You can have the top bunk. I can't use it because I would make a mess." They get inside and close the door.

"I guess you are tired after hearing Zex's boring stories." Xendakk comments.

"Yeah, a little." Jeff replies.

"Then I should see if you have the same reflexes as your sister. Come inside."

And the twins enter their provisional rooms...

1231211111222122212111111211221.content:
Jeff didn't envy Danni, he imagined that her room would have puddles of slime here and there, maybe even smell like a swamp. Following Xendakk into his rooom, Jeff figured that maybe the swamp room wouldn't be too bad.

"Well, she ain't much, but you can have the bottom bunk." Xendakk said as he moved various bits and bobs around, most of them appeared to be bones and pelts from different animals.

"You uh, do much hunting?" Jeff asked as he tried out the mattress on the bottom bunk.

Xendakk looked at him, "What? No. I just take the bones and skins from my fallen enemies." Jeff stared at him, nervous about sharing a room with --- "I'm just messing with you!" Xendakk interrupted Jeffs internal monologue, "My culture values hunting skill above all others, and having a large pikes if bones and pelts is a sign of strength and virility."

Jeff just nodded slowly, "Well, I'm gonna turn in. Wake me when we get there."

Xendakk nodded, skittering to the top bunk and causing the bed to groan, Jeff stayed awake in fear of the bed collapsing on him for the next hour before falling asleep.
1231211111222122212111111211221.title: Jeff and Xendakk

choices: They arrive to Vygam. (No signs of the Kukoo.)
They arrive to Vygam. (The Kukoo are there.)
12312111112221222121111112112211.content:
As Jeff was sleeping, in the next room his sister was having a talk with Cthulhii.

"Sorry for the mess." Cthulhii grabs a mop and cleans the traces of slime on the floor, but it wasn't working because she was leaving one while she moved.

"Don't worry about it, here, let me help you." Danni takes it and cleans while Cthulhii sits on her bunk.

"Thanks." The doctor replies. "It is nice to have another female around."

"Tell me about it." Danni leaves the mop and goes to the top bunk. "How long have you been here with them?"

"Probably like a year or two. My species is known for being isolated from the rest of the galaxy, so I decided to study medicine. After I left my planet, I encounter Pshyx, he was injured and nobody cared about him. Risking that maybe I was dealing with someone dangerous, I cured him. While I was treating him, he explained me about the Kukoo and offered me a job as a medic for his crew." Cthulhii says.

"And you just accepted it?" Danni asks.

"I did. My species has this ability to detect people's feelings and his were genuine. And after a while, I saw how he wanted to help people."

"That's awesome! Check mine." Danni peeks her head out of the bunk.

Cthulhii places a tentacle on Danni's forehead. "You have anxiety, courage and a little of embarrassment."

Danni blushes and retires the tentacle. "Yeah, I forgot to mention that humans aren't used to be naked all the time."

"Then your courage makes you forget it." Cthulhii comments.

"I mean, you guys and the rest of the aliens don't wear clothes, I guess I got used to it. Putting that aside, you know about Vygam?"

"No. The only ones that know about it are Pshyx and Zex."

Danni realizes that she won't find out until they arrive. "Well, I will rest then. Good night, Cthulhii."

"Good night, Danni." The medic turns off the lights.
12312111112221222121111112112211.title: In the female bunk with Danni and Cthulhii

choices: Jeff pairs up with his partner
Danni pairs up with her partner
123121111122212221211111121122111.content:
Come morning, Jeff was stretching as he walked down the hall of the ship, a few computers beeping here and there, but otherwise nice and quiet. Which he was thankful for, he was busy trying to get rid of his morning wood before the rest of the crew woke up, but that all got torpedoed when he saw Cthulhii doing what appeared to be yoga in the common room. And everybody else already there awake and eating breakfast.

'Of course.' He thought to himself as he watched Cthulhii bend and contort herself into shapes that's no human woman could ever do, regardless of how flexible she was. He made sure that there was something between his groin and their line of sight before coughing to get everybody's attention.

"Oh!" She said, smiling as she waved a tentacle at him as she bent her torso down between her legs and around her butt, "Good morning Jeff!" Everybody else acknowledged his appearance with a bob or nod, except for Danni, who giggled at him, knowing what he was doing.

"Morning." He replied, thankfully Cthulhii's dripping slime was enough to help him out with his problem, and he was able to walk around without causing a scene. Then Pshyx walked in, looking excited.

"Alright everybody, the Kukoo don't have a visible presence here." He pulled up a holographic map of the city they'd be searching on Vygam. "We've got three main locations that slave auctions are discretely announced, the arena, the racetrack, and a Gentleman's Club called "The Gentle Moon". Zex decided to give everyone a heads up, "Prepatory: we will be landing in one hour. Encouraging: we will not be noticed."

The crew nodded and picked their teams and destinations.

"Let me take a few things." The medic says, hiding two small guns and some test tubes in of her slimy body. "Just in case, anyway, now we only need our destination."

"Wait, how are we supposed to go unnoticed in a club full of guys?" The blonde girl asks.

12312111112221222121111112112211121.content:
Danni and Cthulhii headed down the street toward the Silver Moon, while Cthulhii had the guns and medical equipment in her bag, Danni went without a bag to maintain use of her flexibility should she need to sneak in anywhere. Unlike the last planet they were on, which was similar to a trading port, Vygam was very much more like Las Vegas, with countless venues of dubious legality and entire buildings covered with neon lights.

"Vygam, the planet of gangsters and money laundering." Cthulhii sneered.

Danni could only nod in agreement as they walked through the streets, various signs and advertisements flying around. She read them as they passed them, 'Rival Removal Services', 'Collateral Damage Lawyers', 'Cash Cleaners', 'Digital order Mates'.

"How come they can operate freely like this?" Danni asked, gesturing to the signs and various aliens of debatable moral standing.

Cthulhii sighed, "The Galactic Concord is not all powerful," she explained, "as long as the planetary government raises no issues, they can't interfere. Vygam is run by the mobs, not just intimidated by them. Their governor is a Kukoo."

Danni stared in astonishment, but nodded and continued to walk. "Well, we're here." She said with some sense of finality. Looking up at the Silver Moon, the chrome building shining and reflecting the neon of the surrounding buildings, she wondered exactly what kind of 'Gentleman's Club' this was.

1231211111222122212111111211221112111.content:
As she looked and listened around backstage, Danni was internally grimacing a true the slime that covered her, 'I can't wait until I get a shower.' She thought to herself, when she overheard some mobsters talking.

"We got a few new specimens." The first alien said, "A Trilak from Tril, a Booni from Boo, and a human from humus."

Danni made a face at that one, but she kept quiet when the second alien talked, "Good. Are they being sold here?"

"No." The first alien countered, "they're on.... wait." She heard a loud sniffing sound, "I think we've gotta eavesdropper."

She tried to run or hide quickly, but the slime that had puddled at her feet caused her to slip, falling on her back as the two aliens walked up to where she was.

"What are you?" The second alien asked, which looked very much like a ball with nine limbs. "You look mammalian, so that slime ain't yours."

"Wait...". The first alien said, "I recognize those features! She's a human!"

Danni didn't even wait for them to act, she pushed off of the wall, causing her to slide past both the aliens before they could act. Pulling up her wrist she yelled "Cthulhii! We've been found out!"

She got an affirmative back when she next saw a massive, slightly fat looking four armed alien standing in front of her, before he fell over, revealing Cthulhii with both ray guns. "Time to move!" She called, tossing Danni a gun.

"Watch me and learn." She replies, shooting two alien guards.

Running through the backstage and hearing shots near them, both go behind a table to cover themselves.

"Rebel Rival." Danni yells at her wrist.

"It won't work. They have to leave their positions, it will take them a while." The medic says.

"Crap." Danni laments.

Cthulhii peeks to see what could be their possible escape route, though, everything was covered, they were next to a window.

"I have an idea." Cthulhii says.

The medic hugs the blonde girl and jumps through the window. They fall outside of the street.

"Phew. That was close." Danni comments, but she then sees Cthulhii bleeding from one of her sides, she was shot. "Cthulhii, are you okay?"

"Yes." She coughs. "It's not a deep wound. I can cure myself in the ship."

"Hey, over here." Both hear a male voice, it was one of the guys from the club.

"We need to get out of here. Are you sure you can still move?" Danni asks.

"Did they leave?" Cthulhii asks.

"Yeah, I think so." Danni responds, before seeing a ray gun aiming at her head.

Two dark figures holding guns made gestures of silence, noticing that there were no signs of people around.

Both sighed of relief and explained everything.

"You really made a mess. Pshyx and I took care of the thugs that were following you." Xendakk said.

"We are sorry." Danni apologizes.

"What's done cannot be undone. We have to get back to the ship." Pshyx said.

"We are leaving?" Danni asks.

"That's not an option, thanks to you two, the Kukoo are showing this to the whole planet." He projects two wanted posters. "But we have a new plan to use this to our favor."

Danni, despite the awkwardness of the naked hug, hugged him back, her first shootout and it was terrifying, nothing at all like the movies show them to be. "Cthulhii was hit." Was all she could think to say a true the moment, "I'm gonna go make sure she's ok."

Cthulhii waved her off, "Its ok, it was your first firefight and we didn't think to consider that they might recognize you or Jeff as human." She chuckled a bit, "That one was a bit of an oversight."

Meanwhile, Jeff was in the common room with the rest of the crew, listening to Pshyx summarize the failure of their recon missions. "We had an oversight when we were not thinking about you two getting recognized as human, and because of the shootout at the Silver Moon, the whole flippin' mafia is on high alert." As Danni and Cthulhii chatted, they noticed Jeff walk in, and Danni notice for that he looked extremely upset, not worried like he'd been earlier. "What's wrong Jeff?" She's asked, walking up to him and giving him a light hug, "We're ok."

Jeff sighed, running his hand through his hair, "Pshyx gave us the new plan, and I don't like it."

Cthulhii, though she wasn't familiar with human facial expressions, could hear how upset he was, "Jeff, honey," she didn't know why she called him that, but her maternal instinct had been going haywire since the firefight, "what's the plan?"

Jeff looked between the only two females on the crew and sighed, trying to stop himself from getting too upset, "Pshyx wants to turn you guys in and track your location to the slave auctions." But the stress from the whole adventure had been building up in him, Danni cried earlier, almost losing his sister was the trigger for him. "I almost lost you once," he said, looking at Danni, "I don't wanna lose you."

Danni pulled him into a hug, and though he didn't cry as openly, he did let out a few tears, both twins noticed Cthulhii joining their hug as she wrapped her arms around them. "It's alright Jeff, Danni and I will be alright."

Jeff nodded, and if Danni noticed how he seemed to always be keeping an eye on her, she didn't say a thing. He knew he wouldn't be able to go with them to drop them off, but he could watch his sister for as long as he could.

"Orders from the boss." Xendakk responds. "If we carry the most wanted females at the moment with only handcuffs they will suspect."

Some guards from the club hold the females and remove their chain while Xendakk claims the money.

"Wait! Let me go. Cthulhii!!" Danni tries to free herself from the guard, suddenly, she feels a needle in her neck and passes out.

1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
When Danni woke up, she found herself in a room with a bright red light, and plenty of other aliens in there with her, none of which were Cthulhii. Everyone had a neon green collar on, and giving hers a little tug, she was given an electric shock, obviously a slave control collar. Danni whimpered, pulling her legs up to her chest and trying to stay as small as she could, she could feel the room gentle swaying, meaning that they were on a spaceship. Wait, a spaceship?

Remembering that they were going to transport that woman off world, she decided to check and see if she was here with her. The storage room they were in was massive, she counted at least thirty unique aliens all confused and panicky, or almost comatose, and almost all of them were trying to hide one or more parts of their bodies. She'd tried asking around if anyone saw the woman, but while she could understand everyone, no one could understand her, she was the only one with the translator.

'Makes sense,' Danni said to herself, 'everyone here is supposed to be from a primitive world like Earth.' But just as she was about to give up finding the woman, she saw a very human looking pair of legs sticking out of the corner.

"Ma'am?" Danni called as she ran up, "Are you alright?"

The woman just groaned, saying nonsense about monsters and nightmares and drowning, Danni noted that the woman's hair was still wet, 'she must've been pulled out of that tube recently' Danni reasoned. As she checked the woman over, making sure that she she was alright, she realized that she knew the woman from the resort! She was....

1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"Roune?" She thought. Having a flashback, Danni remembers that after hearing about the activities in the resort, she was walking to her room when she stumbled with a young woman, dropping the towels she was carrying. She had long brown hair and green eyes and seemed nice.

"I'm really sorry." Danni apologizes.

"It's okay." She picks up the towels. "It was an accident." She looks at Danni "What's the matter? Your first time in a nudist resort?" The woman asks.

"Yes, I mean, not really." Danni awkwardly replies, rubbing her arm.

"I used to be like you, puberty kicks in and suddenly you feel ashamed of your body." The woman says. "But you shouldn't focus on that. Otherwise, you won't enjoy your stay in here."

"Hey, tourist guide. How about you bring those towels I asked you for?" A voice calls her at the end of the hall.

"Coming." She responds. "And if you still have some doubts, use a towel." She gives one to Danni. "Just be yourself." She smiles.

Danni blushes. "Thanks, uh.."

"I'm Roune. I work here as a maid, even though I don't wear a uniform." She leaves. "I hope to see you again." She waves.

After realizing it was her, Danni thought about how to make her react.

"Here goes nothing." She smacks Roune.

"Ow, that hurt!" Roune wakes up.

"Thank god." Danni said. "I was worried that you wouldn't be back."

"Wait, Danni?" The maid focus her eyesight. "Where are we?"

"Before I tell you. What was the last thing you remember?"

"I'm not sure. I went outside to see the stars in the sky, then I heard some noises coming from the barn. After that, I think I saw an alien, but my mind went blurry afterwards. I sound like a crazy lady, right?"

"I don't think so." Danni points to the other aliens with them, Roune couldn't say anything. "We need to do some catch up."

1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
After Roune's panic attack of realizing that she did not, in fact, dream up the alien abduction, and Danni explaining the situation of the last two days or so, Roune was finally calmed down enough to ask a few questions and the general idea of their escape plan.

"You mean to tell me that the entire galaxy is one big nudist society and you and your brother joined a ragtag group to take down a galactic crime syndicate?"

Danni blushed and rubbed her shoulders, "Well, when you put it like that, it seems a bit more ridiculous than it is."

Roune took a calming breath, looking at all the other aliens with the same neon green collars, "And we're being sold as slaves?" She gave her collar another tug, yelping at the sudden shock, rubbing her neck to try and ease the pain.

Danni nodded, "And the plan was to track where this shipment of slaves was going via my communicator." She added this part silently just in case the aliens were listening in on their slave captives, no need to ruin the chances of being rescued. (Silently, she wished she'd recorded Roune's reaction to the screen in Danni's arm, it was pretty funny despite their situation)

"And once we're rescued, then what?" Roune asked, "I don't suppose any of your friends had planned to rescue everyone ... er ... thing, here? And do any of them know where Earth even is?"

Danni shook her head, "The plan is to rescue you, and end the Kukoo's slave trade. After that..." she wobbled her head side to side, "... Earth is known about, but not supposed to be visited, but we should be able to find a ride home considering our circumstances." The two were shocked when they felt the ship suddenly come to a stop, "I guess we're here, stick with me, and just lay low until the Silver Slug crew arrives."

Roune nodded as they were escorted off the ship by several enforcers, a few of which were the same species as Pshyx, Danni noted. 'He did say he used to work for them.' She thought.

"Hi, Drib." Pshyx replies.

"What takes you around here? Last time you were in a Kukoo event was to quit the organization." His brother says.

choices: They kiss awkwardly (both of their first kiss)
Chi, Danni, Roune, and Jed interrupt, embarrassing them
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"Wow." Kree said, listening to Jeff talk about earth, and their adventures in space, "So on other planets, they can walk on the ground?" She shook her head, "Its just so ... against everything we've been taught here."

Jeff nodded as she stopped to lean against one of the railings, even from up here, several hundred feet up, he could here the various animals fighting each other on the ground, "Yeah. I guess if your whole world was the trees and flying it would seem weird." He looked at her wings, he'd always enjoyed flying, on planes, piloting the Silver Slug, flight was always a favorite of his, and Kree was born with it.

"You know," she leaned into him, "you've got a great body."

Jeff squeaked, "Really?" He looked at himself, he was skinny, had a narrow chin, he was average ... down there ... if he wore glasses, he was sure he'd fit the stereotype for 'nerd.'

"Mmhhmm." Kree nodded, pointing to him, "You've got a narrow, noble chin, a lean physique." She leaned in close to his face, "If you were hairier and had wings, you'd be a total bite."

"Oh." He rubbed the back of his head, "I'm not much to look at by human standards." He didn't want to talk about her figure, lean body, decent breasts, if he had to talk about her body, he was sure he'd put his foot in his mouth.

"Their loss." She whispered as she leaned in...
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Kree and Jeff talk and he is attracted to her a...

choices: Jeff asks Kree about herself, to know each other.
Danni and Roune help Chi to make dinner.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
Kree leans some more, Jeff knows this could be his chance to finally have his first kiss. However, his luck ran out.

"Oh my!" Chi says. They turned to see the girls were back.

"I see you are really interested in humans." Jee smiles.

Both blushed and separate a little.

"You were fast." Kree comments, moving away from Jeff to talk to her friend.

Jeff sighed. "You're quite a lady-killer, aren't you?" Danni giggles.

"Stop mocking me." Jeff laments.

"Come on, you act as she won't give you a chance again." Roune adds. "Just go with the flow and eventually, it will happen."

Jeff smiles. "Yeah, I guess so." He rubs her head. "I was forgetting that you have more experience than me."

"Rude." The little girl said.

"Okay, everyone." Chi says. "It's time to go home."
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Chi, Danni, Roune, and Jed interrupt, embarrass...

choices: Communal baths to get cleaned up
Jeff and Kree do the dishes
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
After teasing Jeff and Kree on the way home, Jee said goodbye and flew off to another platform, saying that she had to watch her younger siblings since her parents were on their fourth honeymoon. Jeff and Kree settled in the den, which was Japanese-styled, with a low table and the seats being thin mattresses to sit on. Chi decided to have Danni and Roune join her in prepping dinner, wanting to know them a bit better.

"So girl," Chi said as she grabbed a few shallow bowls and set them on the counter, "how're you coping?" She was of course referencing their exile from their home world by the Concord.

Danni shrugged, looking at the various ingredients Chi was laying out, "I try not to think about it." She looked at a net-like bag Chi was tossing a red powder into before shaking, "What're those?"

Chi held up the bag, "Lumimoths." She shook the bag up a bit more before pouring the contents into a shallow bowl, revealing several dozen powder covered fluttering fuzzy moths. "The spice adds a kick to them while reducing acidity."

Roune eyed the dish nervously and scooted away from it, preferring to help kore with the fruits and leafy dishes instead of the dishes that were still alive. Danni found that she was a good hand at handling the barking worms, and after prepping a few more dishes, they carried the bowls out and set the table.

Jeff, Danni, and Roune were surprised to find out that Chiropt dining involved a little bit of food throwing, but adjusted well, even having fun! Of course, then came the inevitable cleanup...
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Danni and Roune help Chi to make dinner.

choices: Jeff and Kree continue with what they left pending.
Danni and Roune enjoy the bath.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
When they finished dinner, the three humans had their chest covered in powder from the lumimoths.

"Eh, Chi, where is the shower? We need to clean ourselves." Danni says.

"We forgot to tell you." Kree responds. "We use communal baths in Wupam."

"Right, I have everything in here." Chi shows them a bottle of shampoo, two soaps and some sponges. "Let's go."

Chi and Kree guide them towards a big local.

"This the bath district, it's our only way to get clean around here." Chi points at other platforms with steam coming from them. "But we prefer this one."

The interior of the bath has wooden chairs and some stylistic illustrations on its walls, reminiscent of a Japanese Onsen.

"Okay, I guess I should be on my way." Jeff comments. "I'll see you later." But, Kree grabs his arm. "What are you talking about?" She asks.

"These places are like the ones that are on Earth." he explains. "There is one bath for men and another for women."

"We don't do that." Kree responds. "Follow me."

Kree shows Jeff the bath. It was a big lake with rocks around it. "I can show you how to use this bath." She blushes. "Only if you want to."

Jeff nodded and the two go inside.

Chi and the rest decide to not interrupt them.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Communal baths to get cleaned up

choices: The walk back to the house (sleeping arrangements)
In the towel room...
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
As Chi, Danni and Roune went Tom another pool of water, Jeff was nervous about being in the bath with Kree, sure she was pretty, but he'd never bathed with someone who wasn't family before. As he slid into the water, he noticed how warm it was, not too hot, but hot enough that's there was a faint layer of steam, adding to the natural beauty of the area. Of course, once Kree jumped in and splashed him with water, any response in his mind died when he saw how her wet fur clung to her body.

"Now," she said as she walked over to him, the water was only waist deep, "where were we?"

Jeff gulped, "Uhh, taking s bath?" He held up a bar of soap.

Kree chuckled, "Well, yes." She walked two of her fingers up his chest, "But I was talking about earlier..."

"Oh," Jeff nodded dumbly, "right."

Kree smiled and grabbed the bar of soap, "I clean your back, you clean mine?"

Jeff nodded mutely, and after a very tense and somewhat awkward cleaning by both of them, they were rinsing themselves off when Kree grabbed Jeff's hand. "Jeff, you're the first male that I've ever found attractive." She looked into his eyes, "Tell me if I'm right in how you feel about me."

Jeff blushed, and stammered for a bit, but just when Kree looked absolutely crestfallen, he took a gamble, grabbed her shoulders, and kissed her good and hard.

Both their minds went blank at the sensations of their first kisses, and they enjoyed the moment. Which was ruined of course when Jeff got out and Kree started laughing.

"What?" Jeff couldn't help but feel lost at her amusement.

"It shrank!" She giggled, pointing at his hips, which caused him to look down and immediately cover himself.

"That- that happens!" He stammered.

Kree climbed out and took his hands, "I think it's cute." She kissed him on the cheek again before leading him forward, "Now, let's dry ourselves off, shall we?"

Jeff blushed agin so hard he was afraid it'd be permanent as he followed her to where the towels were stored.

Chi, Danni, and Roune were all high-fiving at the show.

"Aren't you worried about them?" Roune asked Chi, gesturing to the two lovebirds, er, bats.

Chi shook he head, "Nah. Kree's got at least another year, maybe ten months before she's mature enough for that." At that, the girls got out of the tubs and headed off to dry off as well.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Jeff and Kree continue with what they left pend...

choices: A new day in Wupam.
Night at a new home.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
The group leaves the communal bath and walk back to Chi and Kree's house. Danni and Roune were talking to Chi, while Kree and Jeff were holding hands.

"Wait, I just remembered something." Chi says. "Did you check your room?"

The three humans shook their heads.

"Okay, I see a little problem here." Chi explains. "I made a nest big enough for only two of you."

Kree raises her arm. "How about Jeff sleeps with me?"

"Denied." Chi responds. "I guess I'll be taking you with me tonight, little thing." She pats Roune's head.

"So, you mean, Jeff and I will?" Danni points out.

Chi nodded, Danni only sighed and thought that she will do it until she is completely tired. Jeff thought that it wouldn't be a problem, except for mornings.

Kree and Jeff keep walking together. "I guess we can't be together all the time." Kree says.

"Yeah, I guess so." Jeff gulped. This was a new experience for him with the plus that his girlfriend was an alien.

"All right, Romeo and Juliet." Danni talks. "We are here. Unless you live in another house." They noticed that they passed their house. Both blushed and walk in.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: The walk back to the house (sleeping arrangements)

choices: ....school!  You're all not adults yet, so get learning!
...shopping, food needs restocked, so head to market
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
The next morning was a new start for most of the house on Wupam, it was Roune's first morning at her younger age, Jeff and Kree's first morning with a significant other, and for Danni, she didn't really have anything different. The twins of course, were incredibly awkward around each other last night and in the morning, just like at the alien hotel all those days ago.

Chi and Roune were the first ones up, and while Chi looked absolutely perky and wide awake, Roune's long hair was a tangled mess of bed head. Thinking back to last night, she blushed, Chi had essentially treated her like a teddy bear, cocooning her with her arms, legs, and wings, Roune spent the night with her head sandwiched between the batwoman's breasts. Awkward to say the least.

Danni was the next one awake, followed by Jeff, who dealt with his morning tradition already, and finally Kree joined them in the kitchen. The teenagers grabbed plates and began helping themselves to the dishes on the table as Chi grabbed a hairbrush.

"So," Chi began as she started combing Roune's hair, "today I'll be hunting for some more furs to make a nest for Jeff." Jeff nodded as he grabbed some breakfast items and put them in his plate, "You four, on the other wing, are going to be busy all day with...."
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: A new day in Wupam.

choices: The first day of school goes well.
The first day of school is bad.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"What? Do you have schools here?" Danni asks.

"Of course, why it wouldn't be?" Chi responds. "We need knowledge to´be better."

"Yeah, yeah. I get it, I know the rest of the speech." Jeff comments. "At least I can see how aliens learn in space." He thought. He and Danni look outside at the platforms on the forest, they realize that is could be more dangerous and at the same time more fun.

"I don't want to go to school." Roune laments, she already finished school on Earth, doing it again wasn't a joy.

"Don't worry, Roune." Chi says. "When you get older, you'll understand." The little girl was more depressed by this, she already accepted being a kid, but this was only part of the cons of reviving her life.

"I can show you around." Kree adds. "That place could be different from the ones you had on Earth."

Chi says goodbye to them and Kree tells them more about school.

"It's weird that we only go twice a week. Also, we don't need to carry backpacks or anything." Danni says, carrying Roune with her.

"I guess it's because of our species, Chi mentioned you that we age differently than you, and in our school we have lockers for our stuff." The bat girl comments. "Either way, I'm sure you'll get a lot of attention today."
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: ....school!  You're all not adults yet, so ...

choices: Follow Roune in the crèche
Meeting Kree's friends at lunch
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
After having to drop off a pouting Roune at the crèche with similarly aged Chiropt, Danni followed Jeff and Kree to their classes, which didn't seem too different. Aside from the wooden hallways and the politics class having a galactic map of all major star systems hanging in it, not too different,

"Ah yes, Jeff and Danni. The hoomons." Their first teacher said as they followed Kree into the class, a wrinkled old bat (literally) who'd looked like he was nothing but skin and bones. "I'm your poetry intructor, Sire Numi."

"Well, uh, Sire, we're called 'humans', not hoomons." Jeff added, but the glare he received caused him to quickly sit down, causing his classmates to laugh, and he received his textbook for all the classes, apparently they just combined everything into one book. Efficient, if bulky.

Kree sent him a sympathetic look and then had to focus as the class had to read, then discuss, the poem 'Ode to a Parasite Eating my Kidneys", which Jeff figured wasn't the worst poem in the book, after briefly seeing on titled "Homage to the Mold in my Hair".

Following Numi's class, which was a boring and dry as dust, they headed off to the next one, and so on through the day.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: The first day of school goes well.

1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
With the three teenagers saying goodbye to Roune, they leave her at the crèche.

"Calm down, Roune." She thought. "There's nothing to worry about. You did this before, so it's just a review of it." She stands in the play area, seeing the other kids around. She thought that trying to be nice, she would be well received, the problem was, as humans are, the little Chiropt weren't too kind with their words.

"Look, she doesn't have wings." "She is ugly." "What if she makes us sick?" Were some of the insults the little maid heard. She decided that she would stay away from them to stop being bullied.

"Hey, weird alien." A kid approaches her. "Why are you here? Nobody likes you."

"I can't go back to my planet." She responded. "Why don't you leave me alone?" She feels she is about to cry when.

"Stop being mean." A Chiropt girl defends her and scares them away. "Are you okay?"

"Thanks." Roune replies. "Who are you?"

"I'm Deene." The girls help her to stand up. "You are different from me."

"I'm a human." Roune giggles.

"Want to be my friend? You can play with me and my brothers." She offers. Roune smiled at her and accepted, after some time it turns out that Deene was..

choices: Continue following Roune
Back to the twins
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"I met Jee!" Roune smiled, "She's nice."

Deene nodded excitedly, "Yeah!" She gasped dramatically as kids do, "Maybe you can roost over!"

Roune looked at Deene oddly, "What's a 'roost over'?"

She looked at her like Roune had spontaneously grown wings like a Chiropt, "It's when you come over to our house and we play, and then we share a nest at night, and then breakfast in the morning."

'Ah, just their term for sleepover.' Roune thought to herself, "Maybe," she said, "but we gotta ask your sister and my ... caretakers." She decided on the term for the twins since it would be less complicated and easier for Reene to understand.

"Ok!" She looked at the forest her brothers were building with their blocks, "Lets have a building competition!" She emptied another bucket of blocks, waving her brothers over, "Roune and me can build a better forest than you!"

"Oh yeah?" Her brothers asked, crossing their arms.

Roune, caught up in the moment nodded, standing with her new friend, "Yeah!"

The four of them laughed as they got to it, and through it all, Roune decided that it wasn't so bad being a kid again after all.

The teachers, meanwhile, shared looks of relief as Roune started making friends, it looked a little worrying for a second there.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: She was Jee's sister.

choices: Roune asks them about the sleepover with Deene.
Jeff and Danni talk with Chi and Roune about their first day.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"It's ready." Roune announces. She made with Deene a surprisingly well done forest with blocks. "You are really good with blocks, Roune." Deene compliments her. The little girl blushed.

"Let's play something else." One of her brothers proposes.

"Ok, but we choose the game." Deene responds. "Oh, my brothers names are Piv and Tem." She tells Roune.

"Hi, Piv and Tem." Roune introduces herself.

The kids greet her back. "What do you want to play, Deene?" Tem asks.

"I know, let's play fly ball." Deene starts to move her wings and she is barely a few inches from the ground. She grabs a ball with her feet and throws it.

"Cool." an amused Roune comments.

"That's enough for today, kids." A teacher stops them. "Your sister is already here."

Roune is about to say goodbye, but she sees Danni and Jeff together with Jee and Kree. "Hey, Roune, how it was your first day?" Danni asks, the small girl was happy and hugs her. "Good. I want you to meet my friend Deene."

"Good to know you made a friend today." Jeff pats her head. "Now it's time to go home."

"Jeff, Danni?" Roune asked, "Can I have a sleepover with Reene?"

Reene, hearing the question, started bugging Jee about it, giving the teens a good laugh, "I guess." Jeff said looking at Danni, who'd nodded her head in agreement.

"We'll have to put together a bag for you first." Danni added, looking over at Jee, "When's a good time to bring her over?"

Jee shrugged, trying to keep a hold of her little brothers, "Anytime before sunset is good."

Reene cheered, and waved goodbye to her new friend as the followed her sister home, up on the next level of platforms.

"Oh. Right." Jeff said, looking up. "You think you could get her up there?" He asked Kree.

"Maybe? I mean, she doesn't weigh that much, do you?" She poked Roune's belly, getting some giggles out of the little girl. "Anyway, even if I can't, Chi can."

That settled, the four went on their walk home, Roune listened to the three discuss their homework and the stuff they read, and decided that she was glad she ended up so young, she didn't have homework! Sure it was a little embarrassing being treated like a little kid again, but at least it had some perks.

They take Roune to the sleepover

"I can't believe how well you adapted to our planet." Kree comments. "I wonder if I could do the same in yours." She didn't know about their situation.

"I think you would fit." Jeff responds. "But you will need to wear clothes." Jeff looks depressed.

"Hey, don't be sad." Danni adds. "We are still together, we are the only humans that met extraterrestrials and now, our little Roune has made a few friends." Danni gets closer to her brother. "And don't forget that you are dating Kree." She whispers.

Jeff nodded. "You're right, Danni. I think we should enjoy more around here. Hey, Kree. Do you mind if we walk around the town?"

"Okay, I wanted to show you some places." Kree grabs his hand. "And while we are here, we can buy some stuff for Roune's sleepover, what do you think, Roune?"

"Yay, I want to bring snacks." The little girl replies.

The group walked through the stores located in different platforms. Roune was interested in a bakery, that was until she saw insects replacing the chocolate. Danni bought a hat in a boutique and Kree and Jeff took a photo together in a fountain.

They run into a few of Kree's friends
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
After walking around a bit, Roune's tiny legs were getting tired, and reached up to Kree, "Carry me?" She put on her best puppy dog eyes.

Kree cooed and nodded, "Of course you little cutie!" She picked the girl up and had her wrap her arms around her neck, wearing her like a bag.

"So fluffy." Roune mumbled though the fur, rubbing her head through it, it was so soft!

Kree giggled, catching up to the twins who were looking at a hunters stall, comparing the furs to animals from earth. She didn't mind Roune acting like a Chiropt pup either, her snuggling into her back was just like how a pup would act, of course, only with their mother, father or close relative, but still, it was a sign of complete trust.

"Oh, she getting tired?" Danni asked, looking over and seeing the redhead buried in the red-orange fur of her friend.

Kree nodded, "Yeah, but I got it."

"Alright then."

They continued to look around the stall, buying a few dried fruits as snack for Roune's sleepover, as the girl still refused to each any bugs, or anything still alive. Kree thought it was weird, since the twins were alright with them, but she didn't know that the twins had acclimated already over the course of several days. Roune was still getting used to the whole 'alien' thing on top of being so young again. Not that anyone aside from the twins knew that last bit.

"Hey, guys. What are you doing?" Kree asks still holding Roune.

"Yeah, we wanted to invite you, Jee and the humans to hang out at the palace." Muli adds.

"It's an abandoned mansion, where we just hang out." Kree replies.

Boli and Muli accepted and join the group.

Once they got to Jee's place, Roune hopped off Kree and disappeared through the door with Reene and her brothers, nothing but their laughing left behind them.

"Looks like you've got your hands full." Jeff laughed.

Jee shrugged, "Meh, my parents will be back tomorrow, so I only have survive until then." She looked st the additions of Boli and Muli, "Where are you guys going?"

Muli hopped up and hovered a bit over the group, "The palace. Wanna come?"

Jee shook Kerr head, nodding inside, "I've got my hands full with four pups. Not exactly leaving my night open guys."

"Alrighty then." Boli said, stretching, "Then see you later!"

As the group walked down the platforms toward the palace, Jeff had a question, "So, aside from the fact that this place is an abandoned mansion, what's so special about It?"

Kree slung her arm over his shoulders and smiled, "That's very simple, you see, the Palace is...."

1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"Really? I never thought that you had ghosts in other planets." Danni comments, at least some familiar topic that she and her brother could understand.

"And who or what is supposed to haunt it?" Jeff asks.

"It's not clear, there are rumors that the mansion was one of the first buildings on platforms." Muli says. "And it's owner was a scientist that created devices to help him with his research. The creatures you see on the ground of our planet were some of the subjects he used."

"The legend says that he died without finishing his investigation, some say his spirit protects the place and others say it's a machine created by him." Boli adds.

"That sounds cool." Jeff replies. "And do you saw anything?"

"Not really." Kree comments. "We've been going there for a few weeks and there's nothing unusual."

The group arrives to the palace. It had the look of a normal mansion, but its windows were broken, there was a lot of vines coming from inside and the door of the front was missing.

"Hurry up, we will show you around." Boli and Muli went inside. However, as the twins step inside, something has awakened.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: "... supposed to be haunted."

1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
The five teens walked slowly and cautiously through the decrepit halls, what little light there was filtering through the damaged roof and soot-covered windows. With the sun setting, everything was cast in an orange light, making strange shadows appear along the floor and walls.

"Wow." Jeff said as the passed through what looked like what used to be the living room, but now looked like a massive beast had gone through and clawed up or eaten parts of everything.

"Yeah, pretty much the whole place is like this." Muli said, kicking a rock down the hall, "We haven't found the lab yet though."

Danni was looking at everything that was left, there weren't any pictures to show what had happened, but from the deep claw marks in the floor and walls, something had definitely found its way in here. The five of them continued on their way through the halls, looking at destroyed bedrooms, a partially untouched kitchen, and strangely enough, the bathroom had been almost completely pulverized.

"That's kinda odd isn't it?" Boli said as they continued to search, "Most of the rooms are trashed, but those two are they anomalies, one room mostly intact, and the other entirely destroyed."

"You think there's something special about them?" Danni asked.

Muli and Boli shared a look before answering in sync, "Oh yeah."

Boli continued, "Lets split up, we'll search one room, you three search the other. How's that?"

Everyone agreed and the group split up, Jeff, Danni and Kree going to one room, and Boli and Muli going to another.

"He must have kept it locked in here." Jeff analyses.

"What makes you think that?" Kree asks.

"By the looks of it. The creature caused a lot of destruction, but the scientist was able to lock it here. That's why the kitchen was safe for the most part."

"Finally, you use some knowledge of your books." Danni adds. "But I feel that something is wrong. Like, how was he able to stop it and where is his lab?"

"I don't know, maybe he used some of his technology. Still, I hope that it's just a legend."

"Don't worry." Kree replies. "I told you, we've been here for a while. Besides, some versions of the legend say that his spirit awakens only if he detects good specimens." She realized what she said. "Uh, If you are done, we should get Muli and Boli." She steps out of the room with hurried steps.

They walked to the kitchen. "Hey, guys. Are you ready to leave?" Kree asks, but they see.....
