They hear them calling for help from somewhere deeper in the palace
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"Muli? Boli?" Kree called, Jeff and Danni looked for footprints or any signs that they had been taken but found none.

"You guys!" Jeff called out, "If this I said a prank, it isn't funny!"

Only his echo answered them.

Danni started to look extremely nervous, as did Jeff, this was reminding them of the Kukoo, how quickly they'd found themselves in an unusual and potentially dangerous situation.

"C'mon, we've gotta find them!" Kree said as she grabbed a hand from both and pulled them along, looking for clues. Thankfully the two were snapped out of their thousand yard stares, and the search began.

Danni was feeling that sense of hopelessness again, just like when it seemed like they wouldn't be able to save Roune, Pshyx showed up and ended up giving them hope. But here, thus wasn't that situation, this was a complete 180 from sci-fi to straight up horror. 'Ghosts aren't real!' She thought to herself.

Jeff was having similar thoughts as he looked for anything that could point to where they went, Kree looked particularly distraught. "Kree, what's wrong?" He asked reaching for her hand.

"They're gone. We've been together since our days in the crèche. And now they're gone." She just stared hopelessly at Jeff.

But as they were losing hope of finding anything...
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: That they were missing.

choices: They were on a table! (They had been shrunk)
She was Kree (Body swap)
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"Guys, help us!" Muli yells.

"They are still here." Kree says relieved. "Where are you, Muli?" But his voice repeated the same line.

"It sounds like it's coming from there." Danni looks at the end of the hall.

"Okay. Stay together and let's move." Jeff instructs. The group walks and now, they hear Boli.

"What's happening? Ahhh!" His scream confirms that they were in the right direction.

"They must be in the scientist's bedroom." Kree points out.

"We are not sure yet. Their voices have more echo and Muli didn't respond." Jeff adds.

They open the bedroom's door and see rotten furniture, the floor was completely moldy and a huge painting was hanging from a wall. Jeff seeing how scared the girls looked, he walks cautiously.

Before he continues, the three hear a smashing sound.

"Wait, Jeff. Maybe we should get some help." Danni says.

"We don't have time and we don't know who took Muli and Boli." Jeff moves quickly and touches the painting. He turns it apart and reveals a hidden door.

"I don't hear them anymore." Kree says. "Let's hurry and save them." The female chiropt opens it. Suddenly, smoke comes from the door and starts to fill the room.

"Kree, close the door." Jeff vision gets blurry and faints, followed by Danni and Kree.

A shadow comes out of the door and sees the three teens on the ground. After a while....

Opening her eyes, Danni wakes up. "Where am I?" She looks at a dark room, lights coming from some weird looking machine are the only source of light.

"Danni, are you here?" She hears Jeff asking.

"Yeah, I'm here." She responds. "Guys. I'm here, too." Kree adds. Danni tries to walk in the dark room, she feels strange and looks at herself in a mirror, then she realizes...
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: They hear them calling for help from somewhere ...

choices: 1.5 inches tall
4 inches tall
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
Looking over at the massive mirror, Danni realized that they weren't just in some strange room, they were standing on a table! They were shrunk!

"Danni! You ok?" Jeff asks as he runs over to her, Kree flies over not a moment later.

"Guys, you're not going to believe what's happened to us." Knee says panicky, looking around fearfully.

"I know." Danni said, pointing at the mirror, "We've shrunk."

The three of them look around at the impossibly huge room around them, the massive table that they're standing on, it's all so surreal and so foreign that a level of uncanny valley was achieved. But they all agreed that they still have to find Boli and Muli, so Kree carefully flew Jeff and Danni down to the floor, Jeff went first. Once all of them were on the floor, the three saw a cord running along the floor.

"I wonder how small we are." Jeff said, standing against the leg of the table and looking up.

Kree, Jeff, and Danni all did the math by comparing themselves to the cord, and Kree briefly flying up to one of the ceiling lights, and found that they were only...
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: They were on a table! (They had been shrunk)

choices: A room with shrunken animals in plastic cages. (No signs of Boli and Muli.)
A giant lab.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"I can't believe it. How did this happen?" Danni asks.

"I don't know. This isn't the room I found behind the painting. Kree, did you find anything?" Jeff tries to think of a strategy.

"Nothing. There are only machines in here and another table in front of us." Kree lands back.

"Okay, I have a plan. We need to get out of here and find Muli and Boli." Jeff says.

"Do you think they?"

"Gotta be honest, I hope they got shrunk, too. I don't think we can deal with something else at our size." Jeff sees the door of the room and he notices a doorknob. "Kree, I need your help."

Kree flies over the doorknob and lets herself go, landing and opening the door, while Danni and Jeff pull the door for enough space.

"God, I'm tired." Jeff recovers his breath.

"And now what? We can leave the room, but we don't know what's outside." Danni comments. "And we don't know who shrunk us, neither."

"Well, we have 3 options. The scientist is alive or his spirit really haunts this place. Or, a machine he left was able to do all of this." Kree returns.

"Unfortunately, that's all we have." Jeff replies.

The three get out of the door and see.....
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: 4 inches tall

choices: Boli and Muli
A native, shrunken predator form the surface
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
Walking through the massive doorway, the three see a lab, to them it looked like one built for mountain-sized giants, but it was in reality just a regularly sized lab, filled with all manner of miscellaneous machinery. The three hurried along, looking for Boli or Muli, calling their names as they went, occasionally being startled as one piece of machinery or another activated or made some other noise.

"This is so surreal." Kree said, looking up at the lab around them.

"Yeah," Danni agreed, "just like Alice in wonderland."

"Who?" Kree asked.

"Just a story from Earth, the main character shrinks in it." Jeff clarified, getting a nod of acknowledgement from Kree.

The three continued on their way though when they heard something, like a faint tapping up on the desk in front of them, hoping that it was their friends, Kree flew up there carrying Danni first before returning to pick up Jeff. Once they oriented themselves to the sound, they say that there was, indeed, a glass cage on the desk, walking up to it, it was dimly lit and they couldn't make out who was inside it until the thing(s) inside came up against the glass.

Who was it?
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: A giant lab.

choices: The scientist, still alive somehow.
Boli and Muli!?
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
Getting closer to the cage, the three try to see who was inside. For their surprise, a robust creature with spikes on its arms and with an oval head roars and hits against the glass.

"Shit!" Danni falls on her butt from the fright.

"It's a predator from the surface." Kree stares at it. "This is the first time I'm so close to one."

Jeff meditates whether this was a good sign or not. "Kree, you know how long this type of creature lives?"

"I don't usually read about things that could eat me, but some of them live much longer than us." Kree responds. "Do you think this is the one that destroyed the palace?"

Danni stands up. "Probably. We should be careful, this only means that whoever shrunk us is still around."

The three sit down on the table to rest.

"And this Alice is able to turn back to her size?" Kree asks, curious by this story.

"Well, she shrinks, she grows, I'll tell you the story after this." Jeff comments. "For now, we need to think our next move."

"This isn't so bad, at least we are not inside cages." Danni says. "If we find out how to reverse this I might stay like this for a while."

"Focus, Danni." Jeff comments. "We already checked that room and then the lab, you think he might have another one?"

"Hey, I'm trying to be positive. And I doubt it, unless he has more subjects." As Danni finishes, they hear a door opening.

"Quickly, let's hide." Jeff exclaims, the three run behind a toolbox on the desk.

Steps start to sound more and more close, Jeff peeks out to finally see who was their captor and he sees.....
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: A native, shrunken predator form the surface

choices: They decide to try and escape for help
Try to return to normal, then escape
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
The three watched as a positively ancient looking Chiropt that made Sire Numi from poetry class look young and vibrant in comparison! As he walked through the door, the three could hear his breathing, more wheezing and robotic sounding than from a person, or alien, and his legs clanked on the ground as though they were metal, though they were covered in the same fur as the other Chiropt. Overall, he looked very much like a skeleton with the skin and fur shrink wrapped on top of him, his wings were no more than tatters hanging from his arms! Kree fought back the urge to vomit at that sight.

"Such nuisances." He wheezed, "Always bothering me! Interrupting my research!" He coughed violently, propping himself on the wall, "Security systems seem untampered, doubt I'll be seeing them again." He stood himself up and walked slowly toward the shrunken predator, leaning in to look at it on eye-level, the beast, rather than cowing in fear, launched itself at the glass in an attempt to maim him. "Such savagery." He scolded the beast, "But such monsters as you serve the purpose of uplifting our file species to our rightful place!"

He looked at the door they'd entered from minutes earlier, "Now, just what kind of aliens were you?" He muttered, entering the room, leaving the three alone again.

"What do we do?" Danni asked, "Once he finds out we're gone, he'll be back for us!"

Knee nodded, "We've got to find a way out, or return to normal. He's an old bat, we can take him on!"

Jeff sighed, "Alright, but which is safer? If we get outside, how long until we get back to the house? We might get stepped on! And staying here with this guy is just as dangerous, so, which seems to offer the best bet at safety?"

The three sat there and thought for a moment before deciding
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: The scientist, still alive somehow.

choices: They can't use it and the scientist catches them.
Only two of them restore their size and escape.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"I'm telling you, we should leave, we could get Chi or Jee to help us." Kree says.

"The problem is the distance, also, what if they end up like us?" Jeff responds. "And now I'm more worried about Boli and Muli, the scientist seems to be only interested in us."

"We don't have time for this. Whoever wants to stay and confront the old geezer raise your hand." Danni proposes and raises her hand. Jeff does the same. "Okay, that settles it." Danni comments. "Let's go get him." But, Jeff holds her arm.

"Danni, we are basically dolls, we can't fight him. I only agreed with you because we need to stay and find a way to restore our size and then we leave." Jeff explains.

"And what's your plan?" However, Kree senses something and quickly tells the twins to hide with her.

"Where did you go, little pests!" They hear the scientist yell, the old chiropt opens the door. "You think you are smarter than me, huh?" He points a gun towards a machine and shrinks it. "You better get out or else I will shrink you until you become smaller than a particle."

The tension was increasing as he was getting closer to them. "What, what is that?" He hears the predator hitting its glass cage. "Stop it!" He exclaims, but the creature continued. "Oh, is that so?" He grabs the cage and puts it on the floor. "If you don't listen to me, then you are useless." He raises his paw and the teens could hear how he was able to smash it. "I need to find those aliens, but first, I'll replace this leg." The scientist leaves the size gun over the table and walks to the other side of the lab.

"This is our chance." Kree whispers.

Jeff sighs. "Okay, follow me and let's get out of here."

The three run towards the device and.....
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Try to return to normal, then escape

choices: He tries to turn Jeff into a Chiropt
He runs tests on them , studying their biology
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
Running up to the device, they all noticed a problem with their plan, namely the fact that they were all too small to operate it. Jeff and Kree were pushing as hard as they could on the trigger, but it just wouldn't budge.

"Aha!" The scientist called, "Gotcha!" He picked them up, and started carrying them through the door he came through earlier, "Now, let begin, shall we?" He asked sarcastically.

Danni felt like she was being held by, well, she couldn't name the feeling, but it felt all kinds of nasty with pieces of his tattered wings in his hands, and how bony he was!

"What do you want with us?" Kree asked, struggling against his hands, Jeff trying to help her as best he could with his arms pinned to his sides.

"Just an inquiry my dear." He responded, "Your friends may have gotten away, but at least I got the two I was after; these bald mutants."

"Hey! We're not mutants! We're humans!" Danni yelled at him, clarifying "Aliens!"

"Hhmmm, I've never heard of your kind."

"Ours hasn't left our planet yet, we were abducted by the Kukoo." Jeff said, causing the scientist to raise his eyebrows, in shock or intrigue, it was unclear.

"Well now, lets see, what was I going to do to you?" The muttered as he plopped the three in a glass container with wood chipping.

Danni felt like she was in a hamster cage.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: They can't use it and the scientist catches...

choices: He hears some noise around the room, but he doesn't care.
Someone appears to help them. (Chi or Jee).
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
The scientist turns on a machine. "Before I start I need to do a check up." He looks at a screen, writes some information and grabs some sort of scanner and puts it against the cage. "Interesting." He looks at the results.

"Let us go." Danni punches the cage.

"Don't be ridiculous. You forced me to get rid of my only specimen." The scientist comments. "The least you can do is be part of my test" Something in the screen catches his attention. "I can't believe it! Finally!" The old chiropt laughs ad loud as he can.

"What's so funny?" Jeff looks at him, defiant.

"Let me introduce myself, I'm Dr. Sylden." He moves towards the teens cage. "I have always been interested in DNA experimentation." He walks around. "It took a lot of research." He turns on the lights in the room and three of them are shocked for what they see. Dozens of small skeletons in jars, all with a similar look at the predators on the surface, however, they looked as if they were growing wings and some had fur covering her bones.

"But, I finally have decent test subjects." He looks at Danni and Jeff. "Thanks to you. Your 'human' DNA is compatible with ours. And I can finally create an hybrid with our genes." He opens the cage and grabs Jeff. "You'll be the first one."

"No, let him go." Danni tries to attack him, but Kree stands on her way. "We can't do anything." Kree looks down.

Dr. Sylden puts Jeff inside a jar and moves it inside a machine. "Don't worry as soon as we finish, you will see how being a chiropt could be a good thing." He is about to start it....

1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
Just as Sylden was about to initiate the machine, several Chiropt wearing helmets and chest amor broke through the skylight, pointing their weapons at the mad doctor, Chi following them at a safe distance.

"Stop!" The lead officer called, "You're under arrest!"

"Arrest? Arrest!" Sylden screeched, "You dare arrest me!? I am this world's greatest genius, and my project shall not be denied!" He slammed his hand down on the machine as the officers opened fire, causing the machine to overload and send out its shocks across the room.

Danni and Kree found themselves returning to their original size, climbing out of the cage before they grew too bid for it, a bolt hit Jeff, but he was obscured by the smoking machine. Sylden tried to hobble away, but found himself tackled by one of the officers who had his arms pinned behind his back, "You're going to face the highest punishment of the law doctor. Banishment to the ground."

Sylden cried out in fear as he was carried away, raving about how they would all suffer without his guidance. Chi immediately ran to her sister and Danni, hugging them, "I'm so glad your alright!" She cried, Danni was too relieved at being rescued to care about the fact that she was being hugged naked.

"Wait," Danni said, looking around, "where's Jeff?"

"I'm here!" Jeff called, climbing over the machine, when he emerged from the smoke, they saw that he was....
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Someone appears to help them. (Chi or Jee).

Roune's at Jee's house.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
Danni and Chi look puzzled at Jeff, while Kree smiles.

"What?" Jeff asks. "Do I have something on my face." He sees his hand, it was covered in fur. "What happened to me?" He notices a pair of wings under his arms. The doctor actually succeeded, he turned him into a Chiropt.

"How do you feel, Jeff?" Danni asks.

"Weird, I'm pretty much the same except I look more like a Chiropt now." Jeff moves his wings.

"That crazy doctor must have a cure." Chi comments. "Don't worry, we can fix this."

"Maybe we shouldn't." Kree walks closer to Jeff. "I think you look better like this."

Jeff was confused. "Really?"

Kree nods. "Now we can fly together and I can show more things around here." She puts a hand on his chest. "You look more handsome." She kisses him on the cheek.

"Whoa. This is...unexpected." Jeff comments. "What do you think, Danni?"

"I don't know. It's your choice, Jeff." She rubs her arm. "And I don't know if we could repair the machine."

Jeff thinks about it. "Well, I guess I can get used to be like this." Kree hugs him.

"By the way, Chi." Danni says. "How did you find us?"

"Muli and Boli, they came and told me everything." She looks at the destroyed lab. "You think the gun he used on you still works?".

"Yeah, it's here." Danni grabs it from the rubble of the room. "Why?"

"Actually, the special forces only believed us because Muli's arm was too small, so I don't think he wants to keep it that way." Chi explains.

"Fine. But I keep this thing." Danni says, she wanted to try it again on herself.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Normal height, but now a Chiropt (a very attrac...

1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
After fiddling with the device and getting Muli's arm and wing back to normal, everyone decided just to go home and deal with all this in the morning. Danni had to give the device over to the Guard for evidence, and the four of them headed home.

"Ow! Bit my tongue again!" Jeff yelled, "How do you talk with such sharp, OW!" He stopped talking Ashe bit his tongue, again.

Kree tried to hold back her laughter at this, " Your language isnunade for our, and now your, mouth shape." She leaned in, "I guess we'll have to give you private lessons on the Chiropti language..." she was practically purring as she leaned in against him.

"Good idea Kree!" Chi said as she separated the two, "I'll make the time to teach him how to speak and how to fly."

Kree blushed and crossed her arms in frustration as Jeff looked away, blushing furiously as well.

"Wait," Danni said, "How're we gonna explain all this," she gestured to Jeff, "to Roune when she gets back tomorrow?"

Chi shrugged, "I guess we'll just have to tell her the truth. Not like we can explain it any other way."

Danni agreed at that point and just kept on walking home with the rest of them.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Restoring everything back to normal.

choices: The explanation goes on.
Jeff or Danni have a nightmare.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
With everything back to normal, the three finished their dinner. However, Jeff started to feel funny.

"Everything okay, Jeff?" Chi sees the teenager trying to hold himself.

"My fur itches." He scratches.

"I see. We forgot to tell you about preen." Chi stands up. "Kree, come here, too."

Danni follows them, fascinated by this new thing about her brother.

"Preen is something you do before you take a bath." Chi and Kree sit down on the floor. "The first you need to do is this." Chi takes her tongue out and licks the fur on her arm. "You do this with all your body. Even with your...."

"I get it." Jeff blushes. "And with my wings too."

"No, for your wings we need to clean them together." Kree explains. "What she was going to say is even with your legs." She lifts up her right leg and licks it. "Obviously it depends of the gender of the Chiropt."

Danni chuckles. "Good luck, bat boy." She goes to her room. Jeff was freaked out and embarrassed, he needed to do this everyday?
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Chi and Kree have to show Jeff how to preen his...

choices: Danni realizes that Jeff now has the Chiropt lifespan
Meanwhile, what Roune  is doing at Jee's
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
As Danni left, Chi continued her instructions, "And of course, there are spots that you will not be able to reach." She had Kree turn around and gestured to her back, "That's where family comes in. Since you don't have your parents here, we will have to step up for you."

Kree did a little fist-pump in happiness.

"Uh, ok?" Was all Jeff could get out as Chi went behind him.

"Alright, start preening what you can, I'll get what you can't." Chi instructed.

Jeff nodded and got to preening, which felt really weird, but the fact Chi was doing the same thing to him on his back felt a lot weirder. But, despite the awkwardness of this whole situation, he was actually enjoying it! Sure it was a very strange thing to do, but his new biology needed him to do it, and it felt really good too.

Kree of course, was upset that her older sister was preening Jeff instead of letting her do it. I mean, sure she'd get a little excited, but she (and now Jeff) were too young to have any interest in anything more intimate for at least a little less than a year yet. Besides, he was her boyfriend!
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: The explanation goes on.

choices: Chi and Kree calm her.
Jeff calms her.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
Danni walks into her room, she was a little nervous about what happened to Jeff. "Control yourself, Danni." She thought. "There's nothing bad about this." But, something came to her mind. After the whole incident at the palace, she forgot about one important detail: The lifespan of this species.

She ran back in the living room, seeing Chi and her brother preening each other. "Sorry for interrupting." Danni comments. "But I need to ask you something Chi."

"Of course, Danni." Chi stands up. "What's the matter?"

"How long Chiropts live?"

"I've already told you, we are technically the same age, but I'm older. If you live long enough, you might see 2 generations of Chiropts."

Danni suddenly felt down. "Jeff, you know what this means, right?"

"I don't know." Jeff oblivious of his fate responds.

"That means..." She starts to sob. "You will be older than me in just a couple of years."

"Come on, you say it as if it's a bad thing." Jeff jokes. He didn't expect what happens next.

"This isn't fair. I don't want to be an adult and know that you won't be next to me." She cries.

Jeff understands her point of view, after all, they were twins and suddenly getting rid of that point was enough to make Danni feel depressed.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Danni realizes that Jeff now has the Chiropt li...

choices: The next morning, they watch the scientis the banished to the ground
Jeff's first language lessons so he'll stop biting his tongue
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"Hey, Danni, it's alright." Jeff said, wrapping his arms around his sister in a loose hug, "We'll get through this."

Danni sniffs, "No, it's not ok!" She turned and poked him in the chest, "We can't go home, and now I'm going to outlive my twin by decades!" She grabbed him in a tight hug, "I don't wanna be alone."

Jeff sighed, hugging his sister back, thinking about it, Chi said she was 5 and a half year old, but that was about 22 human years. That made him about 3.5 years old as a Chiropt, roughly the same age as Kree, which meant he'd be lucky to live past twenty! Suddenly this whole lifespan difference seemed so much more terrible, but on the other hand, if he didn't have this happen to him, he would've outlived Kree. Just no way to win.

"Danni." Jeff said, looking at her, "You may outlive me, but we'll always, always be twins." He tightened his hug a bit more, "I'm scared of this shorter lifespan, but if I want things to work betwee Kree and me, this is how things are, otherwise I would've outlived her. Ow, ow ow." He hissed as he bit his tongue again, thankfully not as bad this time.

"It's just not fair to anyone, is it?" Danni hiccuped into his shoulder.

"No." Jeff agreed, "But we will get through this one day at a time. Ow." As they stood there he giggled, "You tell Roune."

Danni giggled, "Ok."
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Jeff calms her.

choices: Picking up Roune after her sleepover
Fly training with Chi.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
The next morning, Chi, Danni, Kree and Jeff were called to witness Dr. Sylden's punishment. They arrive to a station in which they could see an elevator.

"For testing forbidden experimentation with DNA and kidnapping. Dr. Sylden, you are going to be banished to the surface. May the predators have mercy on your being." A guard declares.

"It's going to take more to stop me!" The guards put the scientist in the elevator and he sees the four at the distance. "Don't worry, my creation, this won't end until your companion sees perfection." They close the door. Making a reference towards Danni.

"Don't listen to him. It's just delusions of a condemned soul." A guard assures them.

Jeff closed his fist, he might accepted his destiny and be together with Kree, but he would never be thankful towards him.

The scientist sees the base of the platforms while he descends. "I guess this is it." He closes his eyes and the elevator disappears into a mist.

"When does the elevator comes back?" Chi asks.

"Never." The guard responds. "We always replace it. It's a one-way trip." They all hear noises of the creatures being below them.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: The next morning, they watch the scientist being..

choices: Danni shows Roune their new shared room with the new nest Chi made
Chi talks to Jeff about dating her sister now that he's a Chiropt
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
The four decided that it'd be best for all of them to pick up Roune, this way they could all verify that the additional Chiropt in the group was Jeff. When they arrived at Jee's, it was a bit funny.

"Wow!" Jee said when she saw Jeff's new body, "Who're you and where have you been all my life?" She started to reach out to see if he was real when Kree stopped her.

"That's Jeff. The crazy scientist exiled to the ground did this to him." Kree said, "So please, hands off."

Jee giggled, "Getting defensive now ain't cha?" She patted Kree on the head, "Don't worry, I won't try and steal him. Roune! Your family's here!" She called back in the house. They heard some goodbyes and promises to see each other at school tomorrow before the pitter-patter of tiny feet was heard.

When Roune got to the door, her long hair was a mess, but she was smiling widely, "That was fun! Can we do it again?" But before anyone could answer she saw a male Chiropt she didn't recognize, "Danni," she said as she hugged the girl's leg, "who's that?"

"This is Jeff." Danni said, angling herself so that Roune would be facing him, "We had an encounter with a mad scientist yesterday, this is the result."

"Hi." Jeff waved as he knelt down to Roune's level, "It's still me Roune."

Roune nodded, but didn't walk next to Jeff on the way home, she had just acclimated to aliens and never seeing earth again, and now she had to get used to mad scientists?!

Those three words seemed to stop the whole Galaxy around Danni, whole just couldn't believe what she'd was hearing. But that wasn't everything, there was more.

1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
The four arrive to their home and they didn't expect what was happening there. A male Chiropt was talking to Chi in the table of the living room.

Chi notices them. "Hi, kids." She stands up. "I forgot what time it is, let me introduce you to someone. He is Lem."

"Nice to meet you." He stands up, he was in good shape and had long short brown hair.

The four replied and couldn't say another word.

"I'll take them to their rooms and I'll be back." Chi comments and leaves him.

After passing the hallway. Danni, Kree and Roune couldn't hold themselves. "What's happening?" They exclaimed.

"I knew you would do that." Chi replies. "Calm down and I'll explain everything. After you went to school, I was doing some shopping and I ran into him. He was an old friend of mine."

"But, are you two?" Danni asks.

"Actually, yes. When we were teens, he asked me to date him, but he had to leave this town because his parents wanted him to attend a school on the other side of the planet. And it turns out, he's still single." Kree blushes.

"That's great." Kree adds. "You finally got a partner." She holds her hand.

"Yeah, about that, this doesn't mean that I won't keep an eye on you two." Chi responds.

"Oh, by the way." Danni interrupts. "Tonight, we are going to the bathhouse and Jeff and your sister proposed to give us a spa treatment. Want to come?"

"Sure." Chi replies. "I've been tense with these things happening so fast. I could really use a massage on my paws."

"Excellent." Danni smiles. "Then, how long is your date staying?"

"He is probably staying for dinner." Chi replies. "I hope you don't mind it."

"Not at all." Roune says. "You should go and keep talking to him, we are going to be okay here."

"Fine, I'll call you when dinner is ready." Chi goes back to the living room.

"Well." Danni turns and faces Jeff and Kree. "I think you can relax until we are at the bathhouse. So, you can go to your rooms." Both sighed and nodded, Kree was so tired and she didn't even try to tease Jeff.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Chi has a date over at the house

choices: Chi asks why Kree and Jeff are doing this sauna treatment
Lem shows the group pics of the archeological sites and goods
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
When dinner was made, Chi called everyone back into the kitchen, Lem sitting on the opposite side of the table as Chi (since Chi was the head of the house, the guest sits opposite them, per Chiropt tradition), and everyone else sitting where they may, as they were family.

"So," Jeff said as he grabbed a spoonful of spiced grubs, "what do you do?" He seemed pretty desperate to take to another guy.

"Oh, I'm a merchant." Lee answered casually, "I mostly deal with the ruins in the Arraki desert near the equator, or in alien products if I run into a non native merchant."

Jeff nodded as Kree looked at Lem suspiciously, "Amd how long will you be in town?"

Lem shrugged, "Not sure. A few months or so, I'm selling my stock with a few Mutani merchants, and negotiating prices for some antiques with nearby museums."

Kree nodded, not wanting her sister to be taken advantage of since it'd been a good year since she'd tried dating, not that Kree had any more experience since Jeff was her first, and more than likely last, boyfriend.

The rest of the dinner went smoothly, Lem talking with Cthulhii about the events on her homeworld, who was in power, latest gossip, and agreeing to set up a private communications link to her parents to talk to them. They learned that it'd been about a century since she'd last talked to them, or her hundreds of siblings, once again, to everyone's surprise.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Danni and company talk to Lem during dinner.

choices: Danni gets interested in the device and decides to stay.
Danni wants to check the device later and leaves to the bathhouse
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"Sound like the Arraki desert is really cool." Jeff says.

"Kind of." Lem replies. "You should take a look." He grabs a backpack and takes out a folder.

The three humans were surprised. It was the first time they saw a familiar object from their home planet.

"I had to print a few photos for the museum." He shows them the first picture. It was him holding an ancient artifact. "Apparently, this was one of the first projectors." He comments. "And this one, it's one of the ruins we found." The second photograph showcases a temple fallen apart.

"Wow. It should be amazing finding things." Danni sees the photos. "I wish I could see one of those antiques."

"Actually, I have one right here." He takes out a circular device. "I don't know what this is." Roune was about to touch it, but Lem takes it away. "I'm sorry, kid. But this thing gets triggered by alien species."

"What do you mean?" Chi asks.

"I don't know, when we found this, one of my workers was from a different species and as he walked towards it, this thing started to glow." He shows it again, with a blue light covering its center. "See? Not wanting to know if this is a grenade or something like that. We decided to just sell it."

"Can I ask you a favor, Lem?" Danni sees the device. "Could you bring it tomorrow? Maybe this thing won't affect us."

"I'll tell you what, you can keep it for this night." Lem puts the device in the table. "But I'll need it tomorrow."

With everyone finishing their dinner. It was time to prepare for the bathhouse.

"Are you sure you don't want to join us?" Chi asks Lem.

"No, thanks." He replies. "I have a meeting in the morning with the museum folks. If I nail this and my other deals, maybe I can stay for more time."

"I would like that." Chi presses a finger on his chest. "Good luck then." She kisses him.

"Thanks. Good night, kids." He says to the rest and walks out.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Lem shows the group pics of the archeological s...

choices: Kree ends up with Cthulhii
Jeff ends up with Cthulhii
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
After seeing Lem off, Danni set aside the device, deciding that Shen could always come back to it in the morning or after the bathhouse. Chi was carrying Roune, asking her how the younger girl wanted her hair styled, loose as I recall was or in a braid, while Cthulhii and Danni chatted away, Jeff and Kree in the back, not looking forward to the forced sauna treatment they were supposed to give.

"So how long does your species live Cthulhii?" Danni asked, looking up at the slimy alien woman.

"To be honest, we aren't quite sure." She shrugged, "Nobody of my race has died of old age yet, as far as I know, so I guess you could say we're functionally immortal."

Danni gasped, as did the other in their group, "So why date Pshyx?" Kree asked, "If you were going to inevitably outlive him?"

Danni shot a look back at Kree, who had the decency to look ashamed, "Probbly the same reason you started dating my brother before he turned into a Chiropt." Danni said forcefully, "The heart wants what the heart wants."

Cthulhii nodded, "That, and he made me laugh."

Thankfully, such awkward and uncomfortable conversation ended when the group arrived at the public baths, choosing an unoccupied one, the group waded in and got comfortable, as Jeff and Kree argued over who had to deal with who.

Kree didn't want to tend to her sister, nor did Jeff want to tend to Danni. And neither wanted to deal with Cthulhii.

Chi was oblivious to this, and was working on Roune's hair, combing it out to make it easier to work with.
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Danni wants to check the device later and leave...

choices: Foot massage? (Kree asks Cthulhii if she had other partners.)
Shoulder massage. (Danni and Kree talk about the future.)
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
"Fine, how about I do Roune and Chi, while you take care of my sister and Cthulhii?" Jeff proposes.

"And why I end up with her?" Kree asks back.

"Because I already did a medical check up with her and I'm not touching that slime again."

Kree rolls her eyes. "Good to know that you care so much about your girlfriend." She turns her back in him. "I'll do it, only because I would do the same if I were you."

"Thanks, Kree." Jeff kisses her on the cheek.

"Stop it, doing that caused this problem in the first place." She blushes.

"All right." He replied. "I'll see you after their massages. Girls, take a seat and let's get started." Jeff comments.

Danni and Cthulhii walk towards Kree and each takes a chair. "Okay, Cthulhii, I'll start with you. Which massage you prefer?"
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.title: Kree ends up with Cthulhii

choices: Chi and Roune talking with Jeff
Keep following Kree, Danni, and Cthulhii
1231211111222122212111111211221112111211.content:
As Kree massaged Cthulhii's shoulders, grimacing at the slimy feeling working its way into her fur, she looked over at Danni, who was scrubbing herself clean with a rag as she waited for her turn. Deciding to start a conversation to avoid things getting too awkward, she nudged Danni with her foot, accidentally bumping the girls behind. "So, Danni," Kree began, "what're your plans for the future once next year rolls around and Jeff and I get our own place?"

"What?" Danni asked, her eyebrows almost at her hairline in shock a time the question. Cthulhii merely opened an eye to see where this was going.

"I mean, next year we'll be legally adults, and barring anything drastic we'll be mates." Kree ignored her own and Danni's blushes, "You've still got a few years yet Jeff tells me. So what're you going to do?"

Danni looked at her hands in the water, thinking, "I don't know." Truthfully she didn't know, especially if Chi and Lem got married, where would that put her and Roune? "I guess we'll figure that out whenever we get there."

Kree nodded along as Cthulhii rolled over and had Kree start massaging her back, which proved to be even more slimy than her shoulders!

choices: They were teleported at the entrance of the resort (The woman is an alien?).
Time stopped (The woman is an alien?).
1231212.content:
"God, what a place the colonel chooses." The twins hear someone outside the barn.

"Right? I would ask why he's been moving things from the HQ recently, but with naked girls everywhere I don't care." Another voice responds.

The twins don't know what to do, so Jeff moves closer to his sister. "I'm going to see what is happening." he said.

Jeff goes and returns.

"There are two tough guys outside." he whispers. "They must be the soldiers you saw last night, but they are naked."

"H..He..Help...m..me" They turned and see the woman, she barely can speak.

"We can't leave her in there." said Danni. "We need to free her." She looks closely and searches for any type of button or switch, fortunately, she finds a control panel in a corner. Danni pulls a level and liquid starts to leak. "Quickly, Jeff, grab her!".

"Did you hear something?" One of the soldiers asks.

"No man, you must be imagining things."

The woman falls and Jeff stops her, he noticed that he was grabbing one of her breasts.

"If you get a boner I'll kick your butt." Danni warns her brother.

"How about you give me a hand instead of threatening me?" Jeff can't hold the woman any longer.

Danni and Jeff are carrying the woman through the barn, suddenly.

"Wait, here´s a spot without tape." One of the soldiers observes. "And is this water?" He peeks. "Who's there?"

"Shit! We need to get out of here!" said Jeff.

The twins were scared, they knew they were trapped, so they closed their eyes, waiting for the worst, however, all went silent.
1231212.title: They heard someone/thing coming
